column4: Hello everyone, from yesterday suddenly my LVMs are not mounting during boot even though I have their entries in fstab, can any one help me with this please?
that's sincerely something I never faced. Do they show up fine in gparted?
yup, I can even mount them manually after loggin in
something changed at user permission level?
not that I know of at least, and no one else uses this machine other than me
is there any log I can check out for this?
but when mounting them manually do you have to enter your password?
yup, I have to mount it as root
then you don't have the proper permissions for automounting as regular user in fstab
Oh! what should I do for that?
looking it up, gimme a sec.
essentially you ought to have "user" in the fstab options for th specific partitions
to allow mounting as a user
I hope it works. Try unmounting and remounting manually before rebooting
